input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for light and environment — whether the lighting reveals the cat effectively and the background supports the subject without distraction.
A cat photograph to evaluate for how effectively the lighting reveals the cat's features, texture, and form.
A cat photograph to evaluate for how clean and non-distracting the background and surrounding space are, and whether they allow the cat to stand out as the clear subject.
A cat photograph to evaluate for overall visual harmony — whether light, environment, and the cat come together to create a coherent, settled, and unified visual experience.

description: Scores how well light and environment serve the cat in a photograph. Evaluates lighting effectiveness on the subject, background cleanliness, and overall visual harmony. Prioritizes function over prestige — good light in a humble setting outscores a stunning location with visual noise. Returns a scalar between 0 and 1.
